docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: GitHub Pagesへのデプロイ方法 docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy 備忘録 バージョンがおかしくなった場合の対処法 ERROR - Deployment terminated: Previous deployment was made with MkDocs version 1.4.1; you are attempting to deploy with an older version (1.2.3). Use --ignore-version to deploy anyway. Deployment Aborted! 上記のエラーとなった場合、下記コマンドで一度デプロイを行う。 docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy --ignore-version Usage hogehoge Add the following line to your mkdocs.yml: theme: name: 'material' Mount the folder where your mkdocs.yml resides as a volume into /docs: Start development server on http://localhost:8000 docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material docker run --rm -it -d -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material Build documentation docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build Deploy documentation to GitHub Pages docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy For other installation methods, configuration options, and a demo, visit squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material docker exec -it loving_galois sh
docs.title: Usage

docs.text: docker run --rm -it -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material build docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy
docs.title: GitHub Pagesへのデプロイ方法

docs.text: ERROR - Deployment terminated: Previous deployment was made with MkDocs version 1.4.1; you are attempting to deploy with an older version (1.2.3). Use --ignore-version to deploy anyway. Deployment Aborted! 上記のエラーとなった場合、下記コマンドで一度デプロイを行う。 docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy --ignore-version
docs.title: バージョンがおかしくなった場合の対処法

docs.text: Add the following line to your mkdocs.yml: theme: name: 'material' Mount the folder where your mkdocs.yml resides as a volume into /docs:
docs.title: Usage hogehoge

docs.text: docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material docker run --rm -it -d -p 8000:8000 -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material
docs.title: Start development server on http://localhost:8000

docs.text: docker run --rm -it -v ~/.ssh:/root/.ssh -v ${PWD}:/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material gh-deploy For other installation methods, configuration options, and a demo, visit squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material docker exec -it loving_galois sh
docs.title: Deploy documentation to GitHub Pages
